body: This Doujin got me into Twisted Wonderland. I had no idea it existed until a couple days ago. I was curious who that cute boy that was getting railed was, and since there aren’t any character tags, I had to go do some research. I’ve since gotten Lilia in his ceremonial robes, and he has become my highest level character! Once we get an SSR variant of him, I’m gonna have to try with all my might to resist going bankrupt!
nice another sioyaki banger even though I can't read it
